original_text: Joseph did not have sex with Mary until after the baby boy was born. He said that the boy's name should be Jesus.
korean_text: 아들을 낳기까지 동침하지 아니하더니 낳으매 이름을 예수라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Joseph did not have sex with Mary
until after the baby boy was born
the boy's name should be Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자아이의 이름은 예수가 되어야 한다고
